name.baseName: Aluminum Recycling ; Recycled Aluminum Ingots ; Scrap Aluminum ; 2016
铝再生 ; 再生铝锭 ; 废铝 ; 2016年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This dataset represents the process of recycling aluminum to create recycled aluminum ingots from scrap aluminum. The recycled ingots can be used across various industries, including but not limited to automotive, construction, electronics, packaging, and aerospace industries. The ingots can be processed further to manufacture aluminum products such as sheets, plates, wires, and tubes that are used in the production of components and structures that benefit from the lightweight properties of aluminum.
此数据集代表了从废铝回收制造再生铝锭的过程。这些再生铝锭可被广泛应用于不同行业，包括但不限于汽车、建筑、电子、包装和航空航天业。这些铝锭可以进一步加工成铝产品，如铝板、铝片、铝线和铝管，这些产品用于生产利用铝的轻质特性的零部件和结构。

technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset represents the process of recycling aluminum to create recycled aluminum ingots from scrap aluminum. The recycled ingots can be used across various industries, including but not limited to automotive, construction, electronics, packaging, and aerospace industries. The ingots can be processed further to manufacture aluminum products such as sheets, plates, wires, and tubes that are used in the production of components and structures that benefit from the lightweight properties of aluminum.
此数据集代表了从废铝回收制造再生铝锭的过程。这些再生铝锭可被广泛应用于不同行业，包括但不限于汽车、建筑、电子、包装和航空航天业。这些铝锭可以进一步加工成铝产品，如铝板、铝片、铝线和铝管，这些产品用于生产利用铝的轻质特性的零部件和结构。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: The LCA data users should consider the technological applicability and methodological advice pertinent to aluminum recycling. It is essential to note that the primary aluminum (PA) and secondary aluminum (SA) data sourced from statistical data and literature respectively should be accurately attributed to the relevant product systems. Furthermore, data users should consider the background data from the CAS RCEES 2018 database with caution, ensuring the temporal relevance (i.e., the year 2016 for this dataset) and geographical specificity to the Chinese context. Any extrapolation or modification of data should account for changes in the industrial processes or technological improvements that have occurred since the publication date.

LCA数据使用者应考虑铝材回收的技术适用性和相关的方法学建议。需要注意的是，来自统计数据的原铝（PA）和文献的再生铝（SA）数据应准确归属于相关的产品系统。此外，数据用户在使用中国科学院生态环境研究中心（CAS RCEES）2018年数据库的背景数据时要谨慎，确保数据的时间相关性（即此数据集的年份为2016年）以及对中国所指定地区的特定性。任何数据的外推或修改都应考虑自数据发布日期以来工业过程或技术改进的变化。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
